name: AIR FORCE CIVILIAN SERVICE FORUM PLATFORM

information.role: Developed with MarCom Group: creative director Bryan Clark, designer Soon Ham
information.description: A Front-End prototype for an online event platform featuring a virtual conference center with interactive lobby, exhibit hall, fully customizable booths, and auditorium.
information.mediaDetail: Built from scratch, tablet / desktop responsive, IE-8 compatible layout, zoom page-transition animations, custom scrollbars, CSS3 animation with IE support using greensock.js, HTML5 video with IE support using video.js, complex nested drop-down menu with embedded custom scrollbar.
